alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 14 at 1:39PM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Blowing and drifting snow will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will also drop to -15 to -30 degrees overnight.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
